content.html: Why do I continue to work at Twitter? First, some backstory… I was the technical co-founder of Pownce, a social network and early competitor to Twitter. Here’s a video of 25-year-old me talking about Pownce (ht @jdlasica and @seeMOUSErun). vimeo.com/1239783
content.value:
Why do I continue to work at Twitter?
First, some backstory…
I was the technical co-founder of Pownce, a social network and early competitor to Twitter. Here’s a video of 25-year-old me talking about Pownce (ht @jdlasica and @seeMOUSErun).
vimeo.com/1239783

content.html: One big reason I continue to work at Twitter is being able to work with inspiring and positive people like @leahculver! We met during our Hack Week project this year & I've been continuously motivated & inspired to think positively about the possibilities ahead for Twitter.
content.value:
One big reason I continue to work at Twitter is being able to work with inspiring and positive people like @leahculver! 

We met during our Hack Week project this year & I've been continuously motivated & inspired to think positively about the possibilities ahead for Twitter.
